description: The Federation of Fruit Producers of Río Negro and Neuquén promotes local fruit and vegetable production through a zero-kilometre model, supplying fresh produce to school canteens. Established in the 1960s, it represents around 1,800 producers across 19 chambers, focusing on defending producers' interests while positively impacting society. The Federation has adapted to modern challenges, enhancing food distribution efficiency and fostering healthy eating habits among children, while also engaging in community fairs and educational initiatives.
name: Federacion Productores de Fruta
